LanguageData.LightColumnMod.label: light column
LanguageData.LightColumnMod.description: A simple mobile column, just lights the area.
LanguageData.DarkColumnMod.label: dark column
LanguageData.DarkColumnMod.description: A simple mobile column, just dim lights the area. People who prefer to work in darklight are happy with this light source.
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeColumnMod.label: orbital trade column
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeColumnMod.description: A utility column, acts like an orbital trade beacon, and lights the area, perfect for warehouses.
LanguageData.SunColumnMod.label: sun column
LanguageData.SunColumnMod.description: A utility column, acts like a sun lamp and keeps your room warm, perfect for greenhouses. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.IceColumnMod.label: frozen column
LanguageData.IceColumnMod.description: A utility column, acts like a cooler, keeps the room at -15Â°C and emits blue light, perfect for fridges.
LanguageData.DetColumnMod.label: cluster column
LanguageData.DetColumnMod.description: An advanced column for base defense. Upon detecting an enemy in any direction, it will detonate a highly explosive cluster charge into the same direction. Can be reloaded.
LanguageData.FlameColumnMod.label: flame column
LanguageData.FlameColumnMod.description: An advanced column for base defense. Upon detecting an enemy in any direction, it will detonate an incendiary bomb charge into the same direction. Can be reloaded.
LanguageData.GraveColumnMod.label: sacred column
LanguageData.GraveColumnMod.description: An ornamented burial column for the honored dead. Designed to keep a dead person for many years.\n\nAltman be praised.
LanguageData.ArchotechDroneColumn.label: Archo Column
LanguageData.ArchotechDroneColumn.description: An ancient archotech cube platform, repurposed as a column.
